member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ASI.ScaleTraining.Business.Client.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:ASI.ScaleTraining.Business.Client.Client
member.summary: This class implements the business layer for clients.

member.name: P:ASI.ScaleTraining.Business.Client.Client.daClient
member.summary: Since business objects are supposed to be stateless, this property eliminates the need to hold a private class-level data access object or to create one on-the-fly in every function requiring one.
member.value: New instance of the data access class.

member.name: M:ASI.ScaleTraining.Business.Client.Client.FindByAccountNameBeginsWith(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of clients matching the search criteria.
member.param: String containing the value to search on.
member.returns: Collection of client objects representing the results of the search.
